title: Responsive Design
des: Completely responsive, fully functional on ipads, iphones, tablets, and other mobile phones.

title: Advanced Features
des: Advanced features tools like graphs, charts, invoices, video & audio call's, projects, etc.

title: Clean Codes
des: Well tested, well documented and W3 validated code. Developers can take advantage immediately.

title: SEO Friendly
des: A SEO friendly website has certain features and characteristics that helps search engines.
